body:
I was working on a project that requires me to send a password protected zip file to a system that can only read Zip Standard Encryption. Not finding any go source for this, I manage to create a working code based on @alexmullins code. Special thanks to you Sir ğŸ‘

While it's not advisable to use Zip Standard Encryption for security reason, for those who have to work with it, you can check my code at https://github.com/yeka/zip

I hope the awesome Go Team can integrate encryption into their standard zip/archive ğŸ˜„
